lead_paragraph: New European Solheim Cup captain Annika Sorenstam has promised to handle things differently if there is a repeat of the unsavoury incident that marred last year's defeat by the United States.

headline.print_headline: New Skipper Sorenstam to 'Handle Things Differently'
headline.main: New Skipper Sorenstam to 'Handle Things Differently'

snippet: New European Solheim Cup captain Annika Sorenstam has promised to handle things differently if there is a repeat of the unsavoury incident that marred last year's defeat by the United States....
